biotools.summary: SPEDRE (Systematic Parameter Estimation in Data-Rich Environments) is a web server for estimating rate parameters of cell signalling dynamics in data-rich environments. SPEDRE estimates reaction rates for biochemical networks, taking as input the connectivity of the network and the concentrations of the molecular species at discrete time points.

bioschemas.name: SPEDRE
